mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx, A.TITLE as title, A.CONTENTS as contents, A.COUNT as count, A.WRITER as writer, A.INDATE as indate, B.USER_NAME as writerNm FROM TB_BOARD A LEFT JOIN TB_USER B ON A.WRITER = B.USER_ID WHERE IDX=#{idX}

SELECT A.IDX as idx, A.TITLE as title, A.CONTENTS as contents, A.COUNT as count, A.WRITER as writer, A.INDATE as indate, B.USER_NAME as writerNm FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE 1=1
AND ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY IDX DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM TB_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
